[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@jsplumb/core](./core.md) &gt; [BehaviouralTypeDescriptor](./core.behaviouraltypedescriptor.md) &gt; [allowLoopback](./core.behaviouraltypedescriptor.allowloopback.md)

## BehaviouralTypeDescriptor.allowLoopback property

Defaults to true. If false, the user will not be permitted to drag a connection from the current node to itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allowLoopback?: boolean;
```
